title: Greg is Hosting E3! (and a BUNCH of PlayStation News) - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.28.21
description:
Head to http://www.CFBBoxBreaks.com now and use code KINDAFUNNY to get 5% Off Your First Break!

Go to http://drsquatch.com and use code dsckfgd for 20% off on orders of $20 or more!

Go to http://sqex.link/remakeKF to pre-order Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade today!

Download the Caviar App and use offer code KINDAFUNNY to get $10 off an order of $20 or more.

Blessing and Tim tackle a HUGE news day head on. Let's talk about a bunch of PlayStation news, Greg Miller hosting E3, and the return of DC Fandome.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:23 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now. It’s our Pokemon Snap review. Tim has played it. Joey has played it. You can get their full review for it right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on Podcast services
PS I Love You XOXO this week is still coming. Be on the lookout for it when it drops, but make sure to get your questions! (Maybe ask about a PlayStation game coming out this week, idk)
The next 2 Tuesdays at 11AM PT right her eon twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:02:55 - E3 has revealed its digital hosts! - Press Release
00:09:45 - The PS5 has shipped 7.8 million units in five months - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:16:45 - Sony To Invest An Additional $183m Into PlayStation Exclusives Over The Next Year - Josh Coulson @ The Gamer
00:28:50 -  The Last of Us: Part 3 Has a Plot, But It's Not Being Made... Yet - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:39:25 -  Ad
00:52:50 - Back to revenue: Microsoft’s gaming division just had its best January-March quarter ever - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
01:02:45 -  ‘Aztech Forgotten Gods’ Headed For Movie Treatment - Mike Fleming Jr @ Deadline
01:04:30 -  Resident Evil Village’s multiplayer mode has been delayed - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
01:05:20 -  DC FANDOME IS BACK
01:06:50 - Out today
01:09:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
